isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 20-SI SERIES, TYPE 300 (BRUSHLESS) - REPAIR PROCEDURES - FIELD COIL CHECKS

svcproc.title: FIELD COIL CHECKS
svcproc.para: To check for grounds, connect an ohmmeter to one field coil lead and to the end frame (Step 2, Figure 8). If ohmmeter reading is low, the field coil is grounded.
To check for opens, connect an ohmmeter to the two field coil leads (Step 3, Figure 8). If ohmmeter reading is high (infinite) the field coil is open.

The winding is checked for short-circuits by connecting an ohmmeter to the field coil (Step 3, Figure 8). If the resistance reading is below the correct value, the winding is shorted. The correct resistance value can be determined by dividing the voltage by the current given in
SPECIFICATIONS
.
